definitions.definition: Of an object : not strong or sturdy , as because of poor construction or upkeep ; not safe or secure .
examples: He hesitated about climbing such a small, rickety ladder.
The rickety old man hardly managed to climb the stairs.

definitions.definition: Affected with or suffering from rickets ; rachitic .

main_definition: Of an object : not strong or sturdy , as because of poor construction or upkeep ; not safe or secure .
secondary_definitions: ( of a person ) Feeble in the joints ; tottering .
( pathology ) Affected with or suffering from rickets ; rachitic .
